attributes.action: increase penaltys on publications that frequently allow journalists to spread homophobia/racism/hatred and get away with a warning
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a recent article which expressed homophobic views, this petition is to urge the government to heavily fine publishers/individual journalists who express/allow expression of homophobic/racist views

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
